7c2e790e-a2a7-42eb-b34e-865cc49c6096.notes: Night Vision 9. Telescopic Vision 4. Colorblindness. No Depth Perception. No Peripheral Vision. Run for 20hrs.

59f4402d-aa7d-4d8a-aeb0-3fb50ced65c9.notes: Targets face at -3. Blinds for 1d seconds. Holdout -6.

535f8c9a-76d9-47aa-b3b7-5733e2b66e2f.notes: 7d cr ex damage; always deals 42 points to a door.

6cb86467-d8c8-4560-8b69-cc398a416a51.notes: Can quietly cut a hasp in (DR + HP)/2 minutes.

caa87489-0aa0-403d-b3d0-460c952f5523.notes: Pack of ten. DR1. HP2. -1 to Escape.

e1b559a0-5f73-4387-8d22-9967a8e27a56.notes: sw-2(2) cut per second to bars, chains, and cables.

1a8af6c7-33dc-43bd-b332-ca8b6ca010c6.notes: For pistols. Enables Holdout, but gives -1 to Fast-Draw.

d63edbec-72eb-466a-8f67-323361a26f5b.notes: Adds Night Vision 7 to another scope or sight. Removes -1 from darkness penalties.  Gives -1 Bulk.
